sdapy.snerun.snobject.flux_to_mag¶

static snobject.flux_to_mag(flux, dflux=None, sigma=5.0, units='zp', zp=23.9, wavelength=None)¶

Converts from fluxes into magnitudes.

Parameters
fluxlist

fluxes

dfluxlist

flux errors

sigmafloat

signal noise ratio threshold for detections

unitsstr

unit system:

  • [zp] zero point

  • [phys] counts

zpfloat

zero points from mag to flux

wavelengthfloat

central wavelength

Returns
maglist

magnitudes

dmaglist

magnitude errors

limmaglist

limiting magnitude

See also

snobject.mag_to_flux

HAFFET
